DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety treatment true bifurcation lesion XIENCE V stent use simple strategy ( stent main vessel provisional T-stenting side branch ) compare complex strategy ( stent main vessel T-stenting side branch ) .
DOC.brief_title: Everolimus-Eluting Stent Bifurcation Coronary Lesions : Comparison Simple Versus Complex Techniques
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old . True Bifurcation lesion ( Medina classification 111 ) , least one main coronary vessel . Diameter main vessel 2,54mm , diameter side branch 2mm great . Significant leave main stenosis . ST elevation myocardial infarction < 48 h. Thrombus burden target lesion . Ejection Fraction < 30 % . Severe Renal Insufficiency ( creatinine > 3 mg/dl ) .
